main.name: Keith Nathan Onyango
main.bio: Hi there! I have been very passionate about computers and programming since my university life. Being a Full-Stack Website developer is not only a passion but a dream to me as getting to create skillfull, elegant and beautiful websites based from the users idea that i value most is what i am happy to say i am proud of. My main aim is to get to create ideas into reality that are able to have a positive impact towards the society and the world. I am looking for a junior fullstack website developer position in a reputed software company that can help me to achieve my goal.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to to build any website application for your business.!

quotes1.title: I would be obliged  to help make your project ideas real
quotes1.description: I love graphic design and photography and have been working on my portfolio since 2016. You can download my resume in order to learn the details of my professional life as a designer and photographer. Contact me and we will discuss your projects!

quotes2.title: I can give your business a new creative start right away! Hire me for your Awesome project
